Sensing4U
Table of Contents

Class SensorFileManager

Namespace
Sensing4USensor.Utils
Assembly
Sensing4USensor.dll

Provides methods to read and write sensor data from binary and CSV files. Implements the Singleton pattern for consistent file management.

public class SensorFileManager

Methods

ReadGridCsv(string)

Reads sensor data from a CSV file with the format: Date,hour 0,...,hour 23.

public List<SensorData>? ReadGridCsv(string path)

Parameters

path string

Path to the CSV file.

Returns

List<SensorData>

List of SensorData or null if reading fails.

ReadPythonDetailedBinary(string)

Reads sensor data from a binary file created using Python-compatible format.

public List<SensorData>? ReadPythonDetailedBinary(string path)

Parameters

path string

Path of the binary file.

Returns

List<SensorData>

List of SensorData objects or null if an error occurs.

To2DArray(List<SensorData>)

Converts a flat list of SensorData into a 2D array with one column.

public SensorData[,] To2DArray(List<SensorData> list)

The list to convert.

Returns

SensorData[,]

A 2D array of SensorData [n,1].

ToDailyHourlyArray(List<SensorData>)

Converts a list of SensorData into a 2D array organized by [day, hour].

public SensorData[,] ToDailyHourlyArray(List<SensorData> data)

Parameters

data List<SensorData>

Flat list of sensor data records.

Returns

SensorData[,]

2D array of SensorData grouped by day and hour.

Saves a 2D array of sensor data to a binary file.

public void WriteBinary(string path, SensorData[,] data)

Parameters

path string

Path where the file will be saved.
